snippet: Uzbekistan wants to make a deal as the Western allies leave Afghanistan: it will provide the roads for shipping equipment out if the coalition leaves some of it behind.
abstract: Uzbekistan has offered to provide United States and its allies with roads for removing vehicles and shipping containers from Afghanistan during military withdrawal in exchange for used military equipment, latest bid to supplement their military despite international embargoes; United States appears to be considering request, despite Uzbekistan's past military crimes, illustrating difficult logistics of winding down war.
lead_paragraph: Uzbekistan wants to make a deal as the Western allies leave Afghanistan: it will provide the roads for shipping equipment out if the coalition leaves some of it behind.

headline.seo: Uzbekistan Wants NATO’s Leftovers From Afghanistan
headline.main: As NATO Prepares for Afghan Withdrawal, Uzbekistan Seeks War’s Leftovers
headline.print_headline: As NATO Prepares for Afghan Withdrawal, Uzbekistan Seeks War’s Leftovers
